name: blocklearner
description: A MERN stack application for learning

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.copy-frontend: sh -c 'echo "Cleaning public directory..." && rm -rf backend/public && echo "Creating public directory..." && mkdir -p backend/public && echo "Copying files..." && cp -rv frontend/dist/* backend/public/ 2>&1 || (echo "Copy failed" && exit 1)'
scripts.verify-copy: sh -c 'echo "Verifying copy..." && ls -la backend/public/ && if [ -f "backend/public/index.html" ]; then echo "Frontend files copied successfully"; else echo "Frontend files not found" && exit 1; fi'
scripts.build: npm run install-all && npm run build-frontend && npm run copy-frontend && npm run verify-copy
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && PORT=10000 nodemon index.js"
